SCUOpenBISImporter
------------------

1) Compilation:

Create an _empty_ Win32 Console Application in Visual Studio, add 
SCUOpenBISImporter.cpp as source file, add the x64 platform, compile in 
release configuration.

2) Distribution:

 -  create a folder containing the SCUOpenBISImporter executable and a subfolder 
    "lib" with the SCUOpenBISImporter.jar package.
    
SCUOpenBISImporterAdmin
-----------------------

1) Compilation:

Create an _empty_ Win32 Console Application in Visual Studio, add 
SCUOpenBISImporterAdmin.cpp as source file, add the x64 platform, compile in 
release configuration.

2) Distribution:

 -  create a folder containing the SCUOpenBISImporterAdmin executable and a  
    subfolder "lib" with the SCUOpenBISImporterAdmin.jar package.
